title: Electric Water Gun, 2-pack Rechargeable Water Gun, Capacity 300CC Toy Gun, 10m Range, Muzzle Flash Water Pistol Suitable for Summer Beach Pool Games, Comes With a Replaceable Battery
features: [Exciting LED Light Show for Day and Night] Turn every water fight into a dazzling visual experience! This water gun features integrated LED lights that glow with every water shot, bringing exciting effects to your game, whether it's day or night. Bright and colorful lights enhance your water fight, making it more thrilling and immersive for everyone involved.

[Quick Charge, Long Game] No need to worry about running out of battery during game play. This electric water gun is powered by a high-capacity lithium-ion battery that provides 30 minutes of non-stop play after just 2 hours of charging. Restore the fun with a fast-charging battery, allowing you to enjoy non-stop water battles with your family and friends.

[Impressive Shooting Range, Gain an Advantage in the Battle] This toy gun gains a competitive advantage with an amazing shooting range of 28 to 32 feet. Thanks to the powerful motor, each shot delivers consistent pressure and accuracy, allowing you to target your opponents from a distance before they have a chance to react. Perfect for long-range water battles!

[Large Water Tank, Endless Fun] This toy pistol's 300cc capacity water tank allows you to play longer. The easy-to-remove, quick-refill design ensures you spend more time playing and less time refilling. Its leak-proof design ensures the water tank stays secure, so you can enjoy long water fights without worrying about messes or interruptions.

[The Ultimate Summer Gift for All Ages] Looking for the perfect summer gift? This pool toys is suitable for all ages and is perfect for any outdoor adventure. Whether it's a pool party, a day at the beach, or backyard fun, it guarantees hours of entertainment. Make your summer memories unforgettable with this must-have water toy for family and friends!
